instruction.title: In case of crime
instruction.text: Call 911 to report a crime in progress or criminal behavior to Cornell Police.

instruction.title: Do not approach or attempt to apprehend the person(s) involved.
instruction.text:
• Take only actions necessary for self‐defense. 

 • If you are safe, stay where you are until the police arrive. Otherwise, try to move to a safe location.

instruction.title: Report as much information as possible including:
instruction.text:
• Type of crime. 

 • Description of persons involved, including height, weight, sex, clothing and any weapons. 

 • Location of crime. 

 • Direction of travel. 

 • Vehicle description, including color, year, make, model and license.

instruction.title: Non-emergence crimes
instruction.text: Call (607) 255‐1111 to report non‐emergency criminal activities
